name: 十五
description:
·This is a pixel-style visual novel plot to independent game inspired by the song "Fifteen Fifty".


·You will play the role of an embarrassed young man who accidentally crosses back to the age of 15 and tries to help his young self make a new choice in order to change the embarrassing situation when he grows up after losing all his memories (only a broken diary and a pile of old newspapers).


·In the game, you will face a large number of plot choices. Different choices will change the life trajectory of people around you, and the life trajectory of different people will affect each other. Finally, it will produce various unexpected story endings like the butterfly effect.


·When you are trying to make up for some young mistakes, you may miss someone or something; When you try to rewrite your story, you may also be creating some unexpected life accidents.


·We can't go back to the past. We can't predict the future. We can only grasp every moment. They will converge into our future!
